name: Tomato Smash
description:
Throw tomatoes at (almost) any website with this bookmarklet.

Create a bookmark with a funny name and paste this into the url field:

javascript:(_=>{import('https://quinten.github.io/tomato-smash/index.js').then(_=>{new TomatoSmash.Game()})})()

Then visit a website and click the bookmarklet. Tomatoes will be thrown in the air and you can smash them onto the site with your mouse or tap finger.

Made with Verf framework for Bookmarklet Jam #1
